name: FelisFire: Highlight Patch and Crafting Items
description: The FelisFire version of the "Flight Rising: Highlight Swipp & Baldwin Items v2" by Zoga. Materials used for Lab Potions or Casey's Crafting are back-lit in purple. Patch items are outlined in red. Certain Event items are outlined in blue. • Highlighted Event Items are: Candle Wax, Doubloon, Rabbit, Rabbit Foot, all Lost Island Map Pieces, and all Lighters and Lighter Refills. • Basic Lighter, Basic Refillable Lighter, Lighter Fluid, Torch Lighter, and Torch Fluid are all listed as event items, since the Haunted Swamp is only accessible during Halloween. (Discs, Orbs, Grams, and Easter Eggs are not highlighted.) NOTE: This does not provide an advantage when gathering. The highlighting/outlining does not show above the panel before you click a square. You cannot see what's under the panels.
additional_info: Updated 11/2/2021, added Broken Fuel Cell to Patch Items
